Name: Shield Dwarf Noble
Traits: Dwarven Resilience. The shield dwarf noble has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.
Actions: Warhammer. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
Reactions: Parry. The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
